p: In a survey of Australian women, Armour et al. (2019b ) reported 35% of 372 participants used yoga/Pilates to self-manage their endometriosis symptoms. An RCT by Gon√ßalves et al. (2017) found that yoga was associated with a reduction in levels of chronic pelvic pain and an improvement in the quality of life in women with endometriosis. Similarly, yoga therapy in the forms of asanas, pranayama and relaxation has been shown to decrease pain intensity and improve the quality of life for women with chronic pelvic pain.
